Interface ChatDAO

  • All Known Implementing Classes:

    The interface Chat dao.

      boolean addMessage​(ChatMessage chatMessage)
      Function that adds a new message into the database, the message is the object recieved by parameters that has all the information related to the message

      Delete all the chat messages between two users.
      java.util.ArrayList<ChatMessage> getAllXats​(User user1, User user2)
      Gets all xats messages that have been texted between the two users recieved on parameters.
